marklogic.body: West is an enemy of the US Constitution. A theocrat betraying our godless US highest law for his rich Rethuglican friends. Ten dollars per hour is tiny compared to the 30 dollars per hour salaries Kock Bros pay tea baggers to lead fake websites. We have a similar traitor to working people in Charleston who told Alcoa workers to " pray " when all a competent honest politician would do is look at all the smokestacks of the plant & put wind electric generators on top, rising Heat drives the vanes EVEN WHEN THE WIND DOES NOT BLOW... Alcoa threatens to shut down the plant paying 3 million dollars per week in electricity bills, with solar & more wind generators they could produce their own electricity in a month after installing enough generators with that kind of money.. Tim Scott is Alan West both shills for Speaker Boner & Limboss www.hireLarryFireBobby.com @VoteLarryDis114:twitter Larry_Carter_Center@yahoo.com 843-926-1750
